metadata.title: O2 Eyewear 7936 Premium Oversize Retro Mirror Funky Flat Sunglasses
features: *Mirrored Lens, 100% Protection Against Harmful UVA/UVB Rays Mirrored lens
Mirrored lens Oversized Lightweight For Superior Comfort frame Sunglass for woman and man with Highly Protective Cases

UV400 PROTECTION-Lenses block 99% or 100% of UVB and UVA rays.UV 400 indicates an eye protection item that has been optimized to prevent eye exposure to both UVA and UVB radiation. One of the biggest differences between UV 400 protected items as compared to other items that protect against the sun's radiation is the fact that UV 400 protected items are capable of blocking light rays as small as 400 nanometers.

LENS-sunglasses are made with the most high quality polycarbonate lenses, which are ultra lightweight and shatterproof. technology is made with even lighter weight material and are even more unbreakable. They are impact resistant and offer perfect clarity of vision. Also, lenses are scratch and impact resistant, offering 100% UV protection.

HIGH QUALITY FRAME - Made with only the highest quality materials, these sunglasses were constructed using special design techniques in order to ensure durability and avoid breakage while engaging in sports and recreational activity.
description: O2 Eyewear offers trendy, up to date latest eyewear styles with qualities and designs surpassing similar mainstream product. we focus on color, design, comfort, value and quality! Super light frame: You can hardly feel them on your face! Sturdy plastic and metal frame for unparalleled durability Great fashion frame with Polarized Lenses! Ultimate protection for your eyes! Unique shape sunglasses not only protect your beautiful eyes but also bring yourchic appearance. Take it home and never miss the trend. O2 Eyewear loves the sunshine, natural beauty, and of course - beautiful eyes. We design each of our glasses with comfort, lift, and spirituality in mind to fit your lifestyle. There is truly a story behind everyone's eyes, and we take pride in creating beautiful eyewear that not only protects, but showcases the mystery of your eyes.Our market expertise comes as a result of years of hands-on experience in eyewear industry, dedication to constant development and improvement and maintaining family-like relationships with industry leading manufacturers. Be assured that our goal is to provide you with great value for money, making your shopping fun and pleasant. O2 Eyewear sunglasses will take good care of your vision protecting your eyes from harmful sun rays .UV400 Lens Technology, absorbing over 99% of harmful UVA and UVB spectrums. To avoid damage, never clean your sunglasses with paper towels or clothing, and also avoid using household detergents or soaps. While a few mild soaps don't harm lenses, today's extra strength soaps are powerful enough to slowly disintegrate lens coatings. Stop waste your money on Overpriced, Poor Quality, chip sunglasses!! O2 eyewear are best high quality 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.MSRP $79.99 Grab a Deal @ Amazon.com for blow out price!
